entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 161,652Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 298

Summary: ‚ÄúOh, you do like to flirt, don‚Äôt you?‚Äù Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entr√©e: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn‚Äôt help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. ‚ÄúFlirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‚ÄòEverything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power‚Äô. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you‚Äôve got the whole world in your hands.‚Äù After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can‚Äôt escape.

entry.title: An Investigation Into The Repeated Appearance of Gotham's Newest (Unsanctioned) Vigilante Team: As Conducted by the BatClan
entry.summary:
Author: half_burnt_ideas

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,814Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 256

Summary: Over the course of a month, the Bats come across a group of heavily armed fruit salad-coloured teenagers with almost Bat-level training. Bruce (nor anyone else in/affiliated with the Family in a position to) doesn‚Äôt remember training anyone, let alone people, in the last few years. Therefore, they were stuck with four main questions:1. Who are these people?2. Why/how do they have (almost) Bat-level training?3. What are they doing in Gotham?4. Were they potential enemies?

entry.title: Chapter 2; The Second Knight
entry.summary:
Author: Corvix_Ailuranthrope_4313

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,922Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Bruce Wayne is many things, he was the protector of Gotham, an orphan, a father and a hero, but the worst thing that he could be, was old, with his allies spread out or gone, he decided to initiate Safeguard 27, an ambitious project that would provide Gotham an eternal protector, but would the protector be ready or even willing to protect his home? Only time and faith would tell for the future of Batman.

entry.title: The Hundred Day Curse
entry.summary:
Author: SolaceInSpace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 142,464Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 4,374

Summary: Gotham was literally cursed but no one believed Bruce. He took it upon himself to fix it and after decades of searching, that solution came to him in the form of a little blue vial. Bruce was to take the curse within himself to temper it into something manageable.He thinks the others would call him stupid and stop him if they knew about this, but (un)fortunately for Bruce, his family hasn't spoken to him for forever. There was no one here to stop him.He downed the liquid and woke up as his nine-year-old self.Ch3 Excerpt:‚ÄúMother, do you remember those funny clouds above people‚Äôs heads I told you about? Well, I‚Äôm doing something about them but the process is very lonely. Or not. I think it‚Äôs just me. I‚Äôm the problem. I can‚Äôt seem to get people to like me enough to stay. I know‚Äì-‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm aware that it‚Äôs due to my own shortcomings but sometimes, it feels like even the worst monsters have people that love them and yet I have no one.‚ÄùBruce let out a humourless chuckle and rested his forehead on his knees.‚ÄúI just wish there was someone that cared about me.‚Äù

entry.title: We're gonna walk on water. There is no need to swim.
entry.summary:
Author: babbzz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,928Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 540

Summary: Damian Al-Ghul does not get sick. He is the son of the Batman.Heir to the Demon‚Äôs Head.The future of the Bat mantle, the pride of his parents, the successor his brothers watch with wary admiration. He does not get sick. Not when he goes under in the Gotham harbor.Not when filthy water fills his lungs and drags him down.Not when he drags himself home, bruised and shaking.Not when the fever blooms behind his eyes the next morning. No.Because Damian Al-Ghul does not get sick.Sickness is weakness, and Damian Al-Ghul is never weak. ‚Ä¶right? He's not sick. Not when the fever climbs, when breathing becomes a battle he can‚Äôt win alone, when the river‚Äôs infection sinks its teeth into his lungs and blood- No. He's fine. Damian Al-Ghul does not get sick. That would imply weakness. And he is an unstoppable, invincible, ten-year-old war assassin- ‚Ä¶who maybe, possibly, hypothetically should not be coughing like that. Or swaying like that. Or unable to get up anymore. No. Because Damian Al-Ghul doesn‚Äôt get sick. (Except, apparently‚Ä¶ Damian Wayne does. He absolutely does.)

entry.title: Purpose of Life
entry.summary:
Author: Nikiclix

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,829Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 253

Summary: Bruce wayne was never tethered to life by happiness. He was tethered by usefulness. By the quiet certainty that somewhere, someone required him to exist tomorrow. That his presence filled a gap that could not yet be closed. That if he stopped moving, stopped breathing, something vital would fail. someone would fall. so when he knows his kids dont need him anymore, bruce wayne decides to leave, for he does not have a purpose anymore. ¬† _________ OR from my prompt on tumblr:what if suicidal Bruce is just building relationships, doing everything he can and caring for his children his whole life and once they don't need him anymore he's smiling proudly at their photo in his phone before ending his life.

entry.title: Bruce Tries Again(for his children)
entry.summary:
Author: Fr0licking_lillies

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,104Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 197

Summary: ›Å‚Çä ‚äπ . ›ÅÀñ . ›Å¬∑Íï§ The Bat-boys are turned into kids by a new form of Fear Gas. Bruce decides he wants to try again with them, with trials and tribulation of course. The boys still have their present mindsets, but get occasional kiddy tendencies, which most cannot handle. But nothing their partners can't fix--even if Bruce gives them mad side-eyes--for their loves. ›Å‚Çä ‚äπ . ›ÅÀñ . ›Å¬∑Íï§ Patrol was supposed to be simple, but instead, Batman found himself on his way to wrangle Scarecrow, and place him under arrest. The alert had been sent while Batman was on his way back to the Wayne manor, so he was last on the scene. ‚ÄúWe got a situation, Batman,‚Äù Red Robin spoke through the comms. ‚ÄúHood has been compromised. Going in‚Äù Batman‚Äôs heart started to speed up. It was alright, his boys could handle themselves. That thought was wiped once the comms cut out with a crackle, Robin‚Äôs shout fizzling out, along with a curse from Tim.

Author: RaineKellen64

Once they break the time loop, nothing is going to stop them from keeping their dad safe, even from himself.OrThe consequences of losing your dad one too many times.OrI love platonic yandere and overprotective Batkids, so I wrote it.-----------------------I have barely read any Batman comics, but I've read a boat load of fanfiction of them. They are OOC.P.S. There is no time line. The title is temporary. This is only my second fic.

entry.title: Why The Robins Came Home
entry.summary:
Author: Smarty2604

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,972Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Dick shows up with twins and a letter that changes everything. Jason comes home with a daughter and a heartbreak he can't fix, no matter how hard he tried. Damian returns without warning, carrying two sons‚Äîmore responsibility than he‚Äôs ever known, and the certainty that he has no room left for pride. And Tim‚ÄîTim's world has shattered in a way that he doesn't know if he'll come back from. But he has to. For his son. Two weeks doesn‚Äôt sound like long‚Äîuntil you‚Äôre raising a baby alone. One by one, the Robins come home carrying infants, exhaustion, and a grief that refuses to wait for you to be ready. The kind that doesn't care how strong you are. What they find isn‚Äôt a mission or a mantle‚Äîbut a family learning how to stand still long enough to heal. Bruce Wayne expects a productive day at the Batcomputer.Instead, he gets his sons back in a single heartbreaking evening. This is where the legacy begins.This is why the Robins came home.

entry.title: Blood and Stones
entry.summary:
Author: salvame

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,082Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Before Gotham had a Dark Knight, it had a Queen. Lady Gotham, the last Vampire Goddess, made a pact with Thomas and Martha Wayne: a child, born of blood and shadow, in exchange for a debt never meant to be paid. That child grew into Bruce Wayne. He became a man. A father. A protector.But blood bargains do not vanish with time, and Lady Gotham has never forgotten her son.
